source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Create Amazing Projects Weaving with Natural Fibers.
items.headline: Learn Quickly and Easily to Create Amazing Baskets, Purses and More. Unique course about traditional Basketry Techniques
objectives_summary: Learn from scratch how to classify the fibers, what kind of fibers artisans use and how to manipulate them.
Learn quickly and easily to weave with natural fiber. Became a master weaving your own decorative coasters from the comfort of your home.
After finishing your coasters, enjoy weaving a more advanced project with the knowledge you just acquired: A decorative basket. You'll learn step by step how to do it.

items.title: Cold Process Intermediate Soapmaking 2
items.headline: Swirling in Soap - Level 1
objectives_summary: Learn to create intermediate swirls using pour techniques
Learn to create intermediate swirls using manipulation techniques
Learn tips for success

items.title: Roses Watercolor Painting by La Fe (оne-color rose)
items.headline: Learn how to paint amazing roses from the Thai watercolor master
objectives_summary: Watercolor painting method of master La Fa who not using a pencil and do amazing paintings
How to use just several colors to make absolutely realistic effect
The order how to draw the roses

items.title: This is a special course of Shodo,  the Japanese calligraphy

visible_instructors.title: “Shu-en” Rie Mukai 向井りえ
visible_instructors.job_title: shodo.書道教師 master of Shodo
visible_instructors.name: “Shu-en” Rie Mukai

items.headline: I want to send my message of peace and prayer to the world from Hiroshima.By doing Shodo, I want to pray for peace.
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of calligraphy         　書道の基礎がわかる
"Ei" can be written with beautiful letters　       ”永”という字が美しく書ける
You  will be able to write what I want to write　あなたのの書きたい字が書けるようになる

items.title: Strip Painting
items.headline: A revolutionary way to easily paint masterpieces
objectives_summary: Create masterful oil on canvass paintings using my revolutionary painting technique

items.title: Chinese painting / Sumie course  : painting bamboo
items.headline: bamboo painting lesson from Beginner to Advanced with english subtitle
objectives_summary: learn every technique of painting bamboo

items.title: Hand Made Soap Making Workshop
items.headline: Art & Craft Lovers,Hand Made Product lovers,Home Makers,Students,Women Entrepreneurs,Business professionals
objectives_summary: Learn to make hand made soaps & kick start your own business.
You can personalize your products and create your own recipes.

The course will give you all the information that you need about oils, butters, fragrances and colours, so that you can easily create your own recipes. Not only do I share my own recipes for all the products demonstrated to give you a start, but I also give you numerous suggestions for alternative ingredients.

items.title: How to Make an Exploding Gift Box

visible_instructors.title: Chelsey Vorosmarty
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist and Owner of Personal Touch Scrapbooking
visible_instructors.name: Chelsey

items.headline: A step by step guide to creating the perfect gift for any occasion.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to make an exploding gift box in any style you wish.
You will be able to create handmade paper roses in any size, color or pattern!
Making paper bows will no longer be a mystery. All those paper scraps will come in handy for decorating any type of package with handmade bows.

items.title: Watercolor Painting for the Beginner

visible_instructors.title: Sharon Elliott
visible_instructors.name: Sharon
visible_instructors.job_title: Phoenix based Artist (Woodcarver, Painter, Basket weaver)

items.headline: Learn the secrets to starting your own Watercolor Painting.
objectives_summary: Master the basics of Water Color Painting
Choose correct supplies i.e.. Paper type, Paints, Brushes
Create your own painted masterpieces

items.title: Landscape Painting for the Beginner
items.headline: Finish a professional level landscape painting by acrylic in easy ways for the beginner
objectives_summary: Finish a professional like landscape painting on 8"x10" canvas
Begin to establish the confidence in canvas drawing, color mixing, painting by acrylic

items.title: Fun At The Beach Watercolour Workshop
items.headline: Workshops are great for Novice Painters to learn New Watercolour Techniques
objectives_summary: Review basic watercolour tecniques and create a beautiful painting of a little boy playing with his dog
'Can't draw', no problem; you will be shown how to transfer an image unto watercolour paper
Learn new techniques to protect the whites of your paper and enjoy pouring watercolours

items.title: 9 Pencil Landscape Pack - Learn How To Draw for Beginners
items.headline: No Free-Hand Drawing Required. Learn to draw AMAZING Landscapes using only 9 Pastel Pencils. Follow Step by Step Videos.
objectives_summary: How to Draw 3 Landscapes with just 9 Pencils
The light to dark rule when layering pastel colours
How to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Owl in colored pencils on drafting film
items.headline: A realistic drawing with colored pencils
objectives_summary: you will learn to draw this beautiful owl with colored pencils on drafting film

items.title: Contemporary Wall Art using Gold Leaf | Home Décor
items.headline: Flower Painting with Gold Leaf
objectives_summary: Canvas preparation
Making texture paste at home with easily available materials
How to apply texture paste on designs

items.title: Gouache portrait for beginners
items.headline: How to paint a portrait with gouache paint
objectives_summary: How to paint a portrait with gouache from a reference photo

items.title: Learn Watercolor Painting: Lotus, Irises, and Magnolia

visible_instructors.title: Brainy Pixel Productions
visible_instructors.name: Brainy Pixel
visible_instructors.job_title: Creativity Instructors, Traditional Arts, Digital Arts, Tech

items.headline: Cynthia Massey Parsons shows you how to create four beautiful floral watercolor paintings for your home.
objectives_summary: Understand the basic supplies needed in almost any watercolor painting project.
Draw/trace a series of four lovely flowers (magnolia blossom, bearded iris, lotus blossom with lily pads, and iris with buds).
Paint, with watercolors, a series of four flowers (magnolia blossom, bearded iris, lotus blossom with lily pads, and iris with buds), suitable for framing in a home.
